title: Design
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on a News idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a configurable background image
and MLB logo in the upper left
and the title of the screen (NEWS)
and informative text (Ready to cast from your phone, laptop or tablet.)
and see a News card with a thumbnail and title

Repeat for all 3 News idle screens

MLB logos are available via the 'MLB.tv logos' link here: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/QAspace/Test+Engineering+-+Devices

There are 6 background images that change with the idle screens every 30 seconds; the background images are located here:
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-01.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-02.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-03.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-04.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-05.jpg
http://cd-images.mlbstatic.com/google/chromecast/receiver-bg-06.jpg

title: News
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on the News idle screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see News idle screen
and the idle screen will include the most recent News video
and will include a thumbnail
and will include a title
and the News idle screen will rotate to the next idle screen after 30 seconds

Repeat for all 3 News idle screens

Note: the 2nd News idle screen will show the next most recent News item, and the 3rd News idle screen will show the third most recent News item

title: Title - 1 line
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps: When a user is on one of the News Idle screens
custom_expected: Then the user will see the title under the thumbnail

title: Title - 2 lines
custom_preconds:
Given a user is connected to a Chromecast device
and a user is idle
custom_steps:
When a user is on one of the News Idle screens
and the title is longer than one line
custom_expected: Then the user will see the title wrap to a second line

title: Failsafe: API/Lookup Issue
custom_preconds: Given a user is connected to a Chromecast
custom_steps:
When a user is idle
and the News lookup is not running
custom_expected:
Then the user will not see the News page(s)
and the other screens will rotate
